ValidationRule.description: Ensures all required fields are filled before submission
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Submission_Status__c, "Submitted"), OR( ISBLANK(Submission_Year__c), ISBLANK(Total_Revenue__c), ISBLANK(AUM__c), ISBLANK(Total_Operating_Expenses__c), ISBLANK(Number_of_Advisors__c), ISBLANK(Number_of_Clients__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in all required fields before submitting: Submission Year, Total Revenue, AUM, Total Operating Expenses, Number of Advisors, and Number of Clients.
